verses.verse: Now it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Adoni-zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> had heard <S%H8085><s%> how <S%H3588><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and had utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it; as <S%H834><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and her king, <S%H4428><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Ai <S%H5857><s%> and her king; <S%H4428><s%> and how <S%H3588><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> had made peace <S%H7999><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and were <S%H1961><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them;

That they feared <S%H3372><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> was a great <S%H1419><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the royal <S%H4467><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and because <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was greater <S%H1419><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> Ai, <S%H5857><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> thereof were mighty. <S%H1368><s%>

Wherefore Adoni-zedek <S%H139><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Hoham <S%H1944><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Piram <S%H6502><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Japhia <S%H3309><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Debir <S%H1688><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Come up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, and help <S%H5826><s%> me, that we may smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gibeon: <S%H1391><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it hath made peace <S%H7999><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Therefore the five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> gathered themselves together, <S%H622><s%> and went up, <S%H5927><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their hosts, <S%H4264><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and made war <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Slack <S%H7503><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> from thy servants; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> come up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> us quickly, <S%H4120><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> us, and help <S%H5826><s%> us: for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are gathered together <S%H6908><s%> against <S%H413><s%> us.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> ascended <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and all <S%H3605><s%> the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> them not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into thine hand; <S%H3027><s%> there shall not <S%H3808><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them suddenly, <S%H6597><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> night. <S%H3915><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> discomfited <S%H2000><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and chased <S%H7291><s%> them along the way <S%H1870><s%> that goeth up <S%H4608><s%> to Beth-horon, <S%H1032><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them to <S%H5704><s%> Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as they fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and were in the going down <S%H4174><s%> to Beth-horon, <S%H1032><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> Azekah, <S%H5825><s%> and they died: <S%H4191><s%> they were more <S%H7227><s%> which <S%H834><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> with hailstones <S%H1259><s%> <S%H68><s%> than they whom <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Sun, <S%H8121><s%> stand thou still <S%H1826><s%> upon Gibeon; <S%H1391><s%> and thou, Moon, <S%H3394><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Ajalon. <S%H357><s%>

And the sun <S%H8121><s%> stood still, <S%H1826><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> stayed, <S%H5975><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the people <S%H1471><s%> had avenged <S%H5358><s%> themselves upon their enemies. <S%H341><s%> Is not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%> of Jasher? <S%H3477><s%> So the sun <S%H8121><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> still in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and hasted <S%H213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to go down <S%H935><s%> about a whole <S%H8549><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And there was <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> like that <S%H1931><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it or after <S%H310><s%> it, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a man: <S%H376><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, unto <S%H413><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> to Gilgal. <S%H1537><s%>
But these <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> and hid themselves <S%H2244><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> are found <S%H4672><s%> hid <S%H2244><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%> at Makkedah. <S%H4719><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Roll <S%H1556><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> and set <S%H6485><s%> men <S%H376><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> it for to keep <S%H8104><s%> them:

And stay <S%H5975><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> but pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and smite the hindmost <S%H2179><s%> of them; suffer <S%H5414><s%> them not <S%H408><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> their cities: <S%H5892><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of slaying <S%H5221><s%> them with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter, <S%H4347><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> they were consumed, <S%H8552><s%> that the rest <S%H8300><s%> which remained <S%H8277><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> in peace: <S%H7965><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> moved <S%H2782><s%> <S%H853><s%> his tongue <S%H3956><s%> against any <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the cave, <S%H4631><s%> and bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me out of <S%H4480><s%> the cave. <S%H4631><s%>

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him out of <S%H4480><s%> the cave, <S%H4631><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Eglon. <S%H5700><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when they brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the captains <S%H7101><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> which went <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, Come near, <S%H7126><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the necks <S%H6677><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> kings. <S%H4428><s%> And they came near, <S%H7126><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> their feet <S%H7272><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the necks <S%H6677><s%> of them.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> be dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of good courage: <S%H553><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3602><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> against whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> fight. <S%H3898><s%>

And afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and slew <S%H4191><s%> them, and hanged <S%H8518><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> trees: <S%H6086><s%> and they were <S%H1961><s%> hanging <S%H8518><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the going down <S%H935><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded, <S%H6680><s%> and they took them down <S%H3381><s%> off the trees, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6086><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the cave <S%H4631><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had been hid, <S%H2244><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the cave's <S%H4631><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> which remain until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> very <S%H6106><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Makkedah, <S%H4719><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein; he let <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> remain: <S%H8300><s%> and he did <S%H6213><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Makkedah <S%H4719><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Makkedah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4719><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, unto Libnah, <S%H3841><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Libnah: <S%H3841><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> it also, <S%H1571><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein; he let <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> remain <S%H8300><s%> in it; but did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof as <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> from Libnah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3841><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, unto Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against it:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which took <S%H3920><s%> it on the second <S%H8145><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Libnah. <S%H3841><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> Horam <S%H2036><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Gezer <S%H1507><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lachish; <S%H3923><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him and his people, <S%H5971><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he had left <S%H7604><s%> him none <S%H1115><s%> remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

And from Lachish <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3923><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> unto Eglon, <S%H5700><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him; and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it:

And they took <S%H3920><s%> it on that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Lachish. <S%H3923><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from Eglon, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5700><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, unto Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it:

And they took <S%H3920><s%> it, and smote <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein; he left <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> remaining, <S%H8300><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Eglon; <S%H5700><s%> but destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it utterly, and all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein.
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, to Debir; <S%H1688><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it:
